name: Ninja Luxe Café 3-in-1 Espresso, Drip Coffee and Cold Brew Machine | Integrated Coffee Grinder, Milk Frother, Assisted Tamper & Built-In Espresso Accessory Storage | Stainless Steel | ES601
short_description: 3 MACHINES IN 1: Brew without limits with no guesswork espresso, well-balanced drip coffee, and rapid cold brew. 2 Espresso Styles — double shot or quad shot, 3 Drip Coffee Styles—classic, rich or over ice, and 2 Cold Brew styles— cold pressed espresso or cold brew coffee (drip coffee and cold brew available in 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18 oz. sizes).

BARISTA ASSIST TECHNOLOGY: Unlock the ultimate guided experience with customized grind size recommendations, weight-based dosing, and active brew adjustments for temperature & pressure for balanced flavor, deliver café-quality brews, no guesswork required.
INTEGRATED GRINDER: The conical burr grinder has 25 grind settings to deliver a fresh, precise grind for versatile drink options for every type of bean.

WEIGHT-BASED DOSING: Different drinks require different amounts of grounds. Our built-in scale does the work for you with weight-based dosing tailored for your chosen drink. Other machines simply grind for a set amount of time, and you need to manually weigh your grounds.

HANDS-FREE FROTHING: Whether using dairy or plant-based milk, creating hot or cold microfoam, the Dual Froth System combines steaming and whisking at the same time to effortlessly create perfectly textured microfoam. Removing the trial-and-error from manual frothing with 4 preset programs including steamed milk, thin froth, thick froth and cold foam
FLAVORFUL COLD-PRESSED DRINKS: Espresso brewed at lower temperature and pressure, at a slower pace to extract a more flavorful, smooth brew. Perfect for creating a crowd-pleasing espresso martini.
PERFECT PUCKS: Assisted tamper delivers the perfect puck with evenly distributed and compact grounds, ensuring ideal conditions for even water distribution that results in a bold, high-quality shot.
BUILT-IN STORAGE: Conveniently store the tamper and funnel on the side of the machine when not in use, and keep brew baskets, brush, and cleaning disc in the built-in storage compartment.

WHAT’S INCLUDED: Portafilter, Milk Jug, Double Basket, Luxe Basket, Assisted Tamper, Cleaning Brush, Cleaning Disc, Funnel, Descaling Powder, Cleaning tablets, Hard Water Testing Kit, Instructions & Inspiration Guide.
Ninja is the #1 Best Selling Espresso Maker in 2025 Year to Date. Source: Circana, LLC, Retail Tracking Service, Espresso Makers, Model ES601, Dollar Sales, Jan 5 2025 – Sep 27 2025
product_description: The ultimate guided experience that makes espresso uncomplicated. The Ninja Luxe Café Premier Series is an intelligent espresso & coffee system with unmatched 3-in-1 versatility (no guesswork espresso, well balanced drip coffee and rapid cold brew), that helps you elevate your coffee routine and create café-quality drinks at home. Barista Assist Technology guides you to the perfect cup from grind size recommendations to automated brew adjustments, while the Dual Froth System effortlessly creates perfectly textured microfoam hands-free.

name: Cafe Bueno Super Automatic Espresso Machine For Home - Coffee Machine With Grinder & Milk Frother For Latte, Cappuccino, Macchiato - Auto Wake & Sleep – All Milk Types
short_description: BARISTA QUALITY COFFEE - You can now make barista quality coffee, cappuccinos, lattes, espresso, and more in the comfort of your home and save money while doing it. A cup of your favorite coffee or espresso could cost as little as 25 CENTS!

HUGE SELECTION - Choose from 19 fully customizable drink options. The Cafe Bueno will be sure to please with options including: espresso, lungo, americano, cappuccino, macchiato, latte, latte macchiato, flat white, warm milk, milk foam, and hot water. Double versions of these drinks are also available.
SELF CLEANING - Make your life easy with four self-cleaning options: milk system clean, regular brewer clean, descaling, deep brewer clean. All of these options are only a button press away.

EASY TO USE - Operating a Cafe Bueno is easier, and less work, than a traditional coffee pot. A large 7" touch screen makes it easy to see, and interact, with all of the options. Your favorite cup of coffee is only a button press away. Automatic notifications tell you when to add water, empty the coffee grounds, or add beans to the hopper.

CUSTOMIZE EVERY DROP - Cafe Bueno's espresso machine allows users to adjust the amount of coffee grounds, the grind of the coffee bean (from very fine to coarse), temperature, amount of water used, milk foam, and warm milk.

FRESH IS BEST - Enjoy fresh coffee that was brewed seconds after it was ground. No longer will your coffee grounds get stale sitting in a bag in the cabinet. Enjoy fresh aromatic coffee with each cup.
REDUCE WASTE - Eliminate waste caused from pod style coffee machines. The only biproduct of making your favorite cup of coffee with a Cafe Bueno is coffee grounds.

HASSLE-FREE SATISFACTION - We take pride in our customers because you become part of the Cafe Bueno family after a purchase of one of our products. If there are ever any issues, just contact us, and we will be glad to help answer each and every one of your questions.
USA BASED CUSTOMER SERVICE - We are here to help you with any questions that you may have.
HOME USE MACHINE - This machine is specifically designed for home use. This machine can support up to 10 cups of coffee per day.

name: CASABREWS ACAFE PLUS Automatic Espresso Machine, 20bar Espresso Coffee Machine with Grinder and Milk Frother, Professional Coffee Maker with Touch Screen for Cappuccino and Americano, Black
short_description: All-in-One and Automatic: Our espresso machine comes with a built-in grinder and steam milk frother. It’s simple to use—one touch to grind, extract, and descale. This automatic brewing system produces perfect coffee for both home and office, where convenience meets quality

Built-In Grinder for Fresh Coffee: This cappuccino machine equipped with an automatic conical burr grinder. With 5 adjustable grind settings, you have complete control over the grind levels to maximize the coffee flavor. Go from whole beans to espresso in minutes for a fresh and flavorful brew. The 160g bean hopper, paired with a silicone sealing ring, ensures the freshness of every cup. Tip: For optimal grinder performance, clean the grinder every 7–10 days for maintenance

Professional 20-Bar Pump: This all-in-one espresso machine features a 20-bar high-pressure pump and a 1350W power system for optimal coffee extraction. Notably, it operates at only about 55dB, making it quieter than most other espresso machine. It fully unlocks coffee oils and aromas, ensuring a smooth, low-acid shot with rich crema. The 20-bar max pressure ensures every extraction is complete and perfect, helping home baristas make golden coffee easily.

Touch Screen and Simple Design: Brew Cappuccino or Americano with just one touch, and enjoy hands-free operation. While the coffee brews, you can do other things. It’s user-friendly and intuitive. This automatic coffee machine fits any kitchen, and its sleek, black appearance makes efficient use of space. The beautiful, glossy coffee maker is a pleasure to the eyes, giving you a fresh start every morning

Powerful Milk Frothing System: Achieve barista-level microfoam with a powerful steam wand, perfect for enhancing coffee flavors. The manual steam wand allows you to feel and adjust the milk temperature, enabling you to customize the microfoam texture to your liking. The automatic cleaning program will activate once you press the power-off button, effectively preventing milk residue buildup for easy cleanup.

Stylish & Practical: The dimensions of this compact automatic espresso machine are 12.36'' H x 7.09'' W x 16.02'' D, making it suitable for most kitchens. The 38.9 oz water tank allows you to brew multiple cups and is detachable for easy refilling. short_description: 12 PRESETS, ENDLESS COMBINATIONS: Hot drinks like espresso, coffee, lattes, and cappucinos, to iced coffee, or simply hot water, take your pick. Top your coffee with silky smooth milk with our proprietary milk system.

YOUR COFFEE IN ONE TOUCH, TAILORED TO YOU: Automatically grinds, tamps and brews at the push of a button with our intuitive color display. Easily adjust strength, volume, and milk level, and save up to 2 profiles to return to your favorites every time.

LATTEGO PROPRIETARY MILK SYSTEM: Frothed. Foamed. Your milk, your way, automatically. LatteGo is the fastest to clean milk system ever: 3 parts, no internal tubes or hidden compartments. Dishwasher safe or can be rinsed clean in 10 seconds.

FAST & QUIET BREWING: Ready when you are. Ready-to-brew in 3 seconds with QuickStart. Prepare your coffee in peace thanks to SilentBrew’s sound shielding and quiet grinding, certified by Quiet Mark. 40% quieter than earlier models.

INVEST IN YOU: Love café-quality coffee? Bring it home with the No.1 Super Automatic Espresso Machine in the US and Canada combined.* Skip the daily $6 coffee shop run, Philips pays for itself in about 6.5 months.**
product_description: Elevate your coffee experience with the Philips Series 4400 Fully Automatic Espresso Machine with LatteGo. LatteGo automatically steams, foams, and froths milk to create cafe favorites. With the intuitive color display, adjust strength, volume, and milk froth level. Save up to 2 profiles to return to your favorite coffee every time. No more waiting: the machine is ready to brew in 3 seconds with QuickStart. With SilentBrew’s sound shielding and quiet grinding, certified by Quiet Mark, enioy 40% quieter brewing than earlier models. Featuring a built-in grinder and 15-Bar pressure pump, the Philips 4400 Series ensures precise and consistent grinding for optimal flavor extraction. product_description: Perfect for the minimalist who seeks maximum flavor, the compact, stainless Italian design of the Linea Classic brings you simplicity, quality and versatility for all your café favorites at home, from lattes and cappuccinos to iced caramel macchiatos, espresso martinis and more, making it the perfect fit for any kitchen countertop. The chrome-detailed visual pressure gauge tracks the pressure in real time, providing an easy visual cue resulting in the perfect brew. And instantly reach the perfect temperature, thanks to Thermoblock technology, providing fast, precise and stable temperature control. Equally matched with quality and simplicity is versatility with the Linea Classic, with its customizable single or double espresso one-touch preset recipes to start brewing your preferred dose automatically, along with an adjustable steam wand with two settings to effortlessly froth milk and alternatives from silky steamed milk, to rich & velvety microfoam for latte art creations. The double height trip tray can be easily adjusted to fit a wide variety of your preferred glassware from espresso to larger latte glasses, and everything in between. Craft café-quality drinks with simplicity & style at home with the Linea Classic espresso machine.

short_description: BE YOUR OWN BARISTA: Bring the energizing taste of coffeehouse brews into your home with the gourmet Chefman Digital Espresso Maker! With a powerful 15-BAR pump and a built-in frother, you’ll be able to brew like a barista every morning.

BREW WITH EASE: Make your coffee bar a staple stop in your morning routine. With simple one-touch operation, you can brew and froth your perfect cup of coffee with ease. Just fill the portafilter with your favorite ground espresso, choose your drink on the touch controls, and enjoy!

KEEP IT TIDY: Clean up with ease using the built-in internal cleaning function; just push and watch your espresso machine do the work. The sleek stainless-steel exterior cleans with the wipe of a damp cloth, no scrubbing needed.
